body.name: Glade Air Freshener, Room Spray, Cotton Cloud Dream, 8.3 Oz, 2 Count
features: Turn up the good vibes, energize the mood and get instant fresh fragrance with this air freshener spray from the Glade Limited Edition Positive Vibes Collection​
Glade Cotton Cloud Dream Aerosol Spray lets you instantly spritz any space with spring sweetness – freshen any room and freshen the mood at the same time
Bring on light airy vibes for spring with this room spray with a fresh scent that has notes of cotton, airy clouds and sunkissed skies.
Glade home scents are expertly crafted by master perfumers, with feel-good ingredients and fragrance infused with essential oils to bring rejuvenating scent into your life
Get into the spirit of spring and keep the good vibes going with this room freshener spray that's made without parabens, phthalates, or formaldehydess
body.description: Create a special mood and fill the day with bliss with airy Glade Cotton Cloud Dream Air Freshener Spray. It's part of our Limited Edition Positive Vibes Collection, specially designed to help you unlock the vibes of the spring season. Instantly spritz any space with sweetness. Our air freshener for home has been expertly crafted by master perfumers. With fragrance infused with essential oils and feel-good ingredients, this Glade spray features notes of cotton, airy clouds and sunkissed skies. The good vibes keep on going with this air spray, as it's made without parabens, phthalates, or formaldehydes. The steel can contains at least 10% post-consumer recycled material. To find your vibe, check out the entire Limited Edition Positive Vibes Collection. We've got the scent to match your spring moments. Get into the spirit of spring and turn up the good vibes. Instantly freshen any room – and freshen the mood at the same time – with our Cotton Cloud Dream air spray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells really good
reviews.reviewText: I like to use this in the restroom. The smell is not too overpowering for my severe allergies. It's one of the better scents in this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad but…..
reviews.reviewText: I searched for a cotton candy scented room spray and this came up. I was hoping it’d smell something similar to cotton candy but it smells like baby powder and fresh linen. It smells good but not what I was really looking for. Not something I’d buy again sadly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparys & Smell's good.👍🏽😊
reviews.reviewText: Came Packed Perfectly nice and clean, no spill's or dents. The smell is good & light, not overpowering. This is the least strongest smell. Out of all the one's I've tried. The sparyer is good also, the sparyer is a bit hard to push down. Maybe for elderly people. It's not to hard to push & hold. will buy again, I love the difference sents. Delivery was on time, I recommend this New Glade Air Freshener Spary.👍🏽😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I expected a better smell but its not bad for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Smelt clean but my friend thinks it oddly smells like drinking alcohol. I’ve tried better from this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would have loved to use these as I like the scent. The design of the spray is not the best. Instead of fine mist or aerosol, it’s big chunks of liquid coming out and wets every surface. Not the spray for me. I love the price and that it comes in a twin pack. The spray can design can be better. If they can make this in a continuous mist spray form, it would be better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sad it's limited edition
reviews.reviewText: This is my ALL TIME favorite glad spray scent and I am so saddened it isn't a normal, everyday scent. Sellers now are taking advantage it's limited because the price went from ,$5 for two, to over $15 😑

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorite scents!
reviews.reviewText: I would love to know what fragrances are in this! I typically get tired of scents very easily, but I will definitely be ordering again!It’s potent, but not overwhelming. Masks scents well.Definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right for indoor freshness
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I was out of my usual air freshener and I am glad I did. It smells really good: It freshens quickly and lasts long. I recommend this.
